column4: is someone here willing to help me out configure codecs ? I missed something up and now I can't watch divx, mpeg, all kind of movies in fullscreen mode. If I do full screen picture is made by big squares.. Can someone help me out clean the codecs ??
problem is I can't remeber the names of codecs :S I have installed all kinds of codecs including windows32
you mean codecs in addition to what's available in the repositories?
ah... I don't know then cuz usually I just stick to the official "unofficial" ones, so i just reinstall them when something goes wrong
